title: Beef and Lotus Root Stir Fry
ingredients: ['Marinade', '1/2 tablespoon sugar', '1/2 tablespoon light soy sauce or 1 tablespoon dark soy sauce', '1-2 tablespoons cornflour, mixed with 1 tablespoon water', '450g beef steak, thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon oil', '1 tablespoon chopped garlic', '1 tablespoon oil', '3 small lotus roots, peeled and sliced', '10 small dried black fungus (wood ear mushrooms), soaked and sliced', 'hot water, as needed']
